# Spanish Rice

... with the usual caveat that I am going for simplicity rather than authenticity

In a pressure cooker, combine

* 1 can (14.5 oz) chicken broth
* 1 can tomato sauce
* 1 tbsp garlic powder
* 1 tbsp onion powder
* 3 cups rice (rinsed)

and cook on high for 8 minutes
